comments.value:
*
     * Creates a new Host instance.
     * @param {String} url
     * @param {IBackoffStrategy} backoff

*
     * Marks a failure on the host and returns the length of time it
     * should be removed from the pool

*

     * It resets the host's backoff strategy.
